Posts.EditableText: Hi, I wonder how you change the names of verbs, I had the "print a message" option on many of my verbs, and I wrote a BIG text there. Then I realised that on many of the verbs contained numbers, which the game didn't react to so I had change the names of the verb, however, I found that you couldn't use copy and paste in quest in order to move my big "text blocks", so now I wonder, how do you change the names of verbs? Not remove and create new ones, but rename them.
Posts.HTML: Hi, I wonder how you change the names of verbs, I had the "print a message" option on many of my verbs, and I wrote a BIG text there. Then I realised that on many of the verbs contained numbers, which the game didn't react to so I had change the names of the verb, however, I found that you couldn't use copy and paste in quest in order to move my big "text blocks", so now I wonder, how do you change the names of verbs? Not remove and create new ones, but rename them.
